titles.title: To require the national instant criminal background check system to be established and used in connection with firearms transfers by November 28, 1997.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to terminate the waiting period requirement for firearms transfers on November 27, 1997. Requires the national instant criminal background check system to be established and used in connection with such transfers by November 28, 1997.
